metadata.name: LET NATURE RAIN!!
metadata.description:
Ariana (Voilet) : Ahhhh!!! When is it going to stop raining, Ray? We needed to go outside and paint!

Ray (Blue) : Have patience, Ariana! Allow nature to do its work. Allow it to work its magic so that we can paint beautiful nature.

Ariana (Voilet) : Oh, yes!! The weather is going to be fantastic then!! I'm really looking forward to seeing what nature has in store for us to paint!!

Ray (Blue) : Yes! Yes! Ariana, my beloved! Mother Nature never fails to provide us with the finest!

This piece is part of a magnificent tale that will unfold as you look at the other pieces in this collection, eventually. Every piece of art tells a tale in itself though, with a hint to the following piece ;)

Tools Used : Blender 3D, Adobe Premiere Pro
Details :
1920 x1080 pixels (.MP4 NCS Music)

Happy Bidding Fam!
